Class Node<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Node<T>

  • public class Node<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    The classic node class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Node(T data, java.lang.String key, boolean blocked, int cost)
      this constructor is for BFS and DFS
      Node(T data, java.lang.String key, boolean blocked, int cost, T goal)
      this constructor is for A* bc each node contains location of goal
